details:
adjective
- exhibiting courtesy and politeness
= example: exhibiting courtesy and politeness
= synonyms: gracious
- excessively fastidious and easily disgusted
= example: excessively fastidious and easily disgusted
= synonyms: dainty, overnice, prissy, squeamish
- pleasant or pleasing or agreeable in nature or appearance
= example: pleasant or pleasing or agreeable in nature or appearance
- done with delicacy and skill
= example: done with delicacy and skill
= synonyms: skillful
- socially or conventionally correct
= synonyms: decent
